    Cleans GWAS summary statistics and adds metadata

    process_gwas_sumstats.Rd

    Cleans GWAS summary statistics and adds metadata

    process_gwas_sumstats(
  sumstats_file,
  chr = "chr",
  pos = "pos",
  beta = "beta",
  se = "se",
  a0 = "a0",
  a1 = "a1",
  snp = "snp",
  pval = "pval",
  bigSNP,
  LD_Blocks
)

    Arguments

    sumstats_file

    file containing raw summary statistics. Coordinates should be hg19/b37; we current do not support hg38.

    chr

    Name of the chromosome column in summary statistics file.

    pos

    Name of the position column (base pair position, in hg19!).

    beta

    Name of beta column (if you have Odds Ratio, you will need to transform it to log(Odds Ratio)).

    se

    Name of the standard error (se) column.

    a0

    Column name of the reference allele.

    a1

    Column name of the association/effect allele.

    snp

    Name of the SNP ID (rsID) column.

    pval

    Name of the p-value column.

    bigSNP

    bigSNP object from bigsnpr.

    LD_Blocks

    Reference LD blocks

    Value

    Cleaned summary statistics + LD block of every SNP, as well as its index in the reference panel of genotypes

    Contents

    Developed by Kaixuan Luo, Alan Selewa, Sebastian Pott, Xin He.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.6.
